name: The Grimsworth Reports: Woodfall
description: Chuck Grimsworth receives a frantic call from the sheriff of a small town called Woodfall. There he discovers an eccentric community with skeletons hiding in every closet. Only Chuck can solve and unearth the ancient conflict which plagues Woodfall!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP 3 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: WebGL Compatible with latest drivers Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Additional Notes: Woodfall runs via NW.js and HTML5
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2 GHz dual-core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia or AMD with latest drivers Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Additional Notes: Woodfall runs via NW.js and HTML5
